item.title: This stock is set to get a boost from AMD's OpenAI deal, according to Citi
item.description: Astera Labs jumped 10% Monday after the semiconductor maker got a Street high $275 price target from Citigroup.

item.title: AMD is rallying day two after a very bullish call from Wall Street
item.description: Jefferies upgraded AMD to buy and sees a big rally in the shares ahead.

item.title: Shares of Chili's owner Brinker are rising on a JPMorgan upgrade. Here's why the bank thinks the stock is cheap
item.description: The bank upgraded the stock to overweight from neutral.

item.title: This animal health stock is up 70% in 2025. JPMorgan says it has further gains
item.description: Analyst Chris Schott upgraded the stock to overweight from neutral.

item.title: Dollar Tree gets a downgrade from Jefferies as discount retailer struggles versus competitors
item.description: Jefferies thinks it's time to leave Dollar Tree behind.
